DOC.brief_summary: Acute supplementation of Sustamine(TM), a combination of two amino acids, will improve cycling performance and mental acuity in a dose-dependent response.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Sustamine(TM) on Cycling Time Trial Performance
DOC.criteria: Competitive cyclist or triathlete Male (VO2max >= 55 ml/kg/min) or Female (VO2max >= 45 ml/kg/min) Healthy Blood pressure below 140/90 Nonsmoker Antidepressant medications Inconsistent regular medications Consumption performanceenhancing substances Type I or Type II diabetes Renal, hepatic or cardiac disease Current infectious disease
